import React, { useState , Fragment } from 'react' import {Link , withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {createProfile} from '../../actions/profile' const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData , setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const [displaySocialInputs , toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData , [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return (
